content: There is nothing in the VF resources to describe the test/strategy. This info is important for how we display and report in the EMR - potentially worth adding to the IG?
Some of the visual field observations sent don't have an effective date time, eg. Observation/2113766 - should this be mandatory?

Leah King said:

Some of the visual field observations sent don't have an effective date time, eg. Observation/2113766 - should this be mandatory?

Same for the diagnostic report that the above observation is linked to, DiagnosticReport/2113831
